thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 84 of 1961
thread.title: Lucie Johnson

author: Lucie Johnson
title: Lucie Johnson
text:
When we discovered our car had a flat tyre we decided that rather than putting on the spare (which on our car is a job for a professional and not us) and taking it to our usual tyre place we would find someone who would come to us.
We came across tyres on the drive on google and decided to give them a go. We were not disappointed, the price was good and the service was excellent. The guy that came out even checked the tread and pressure of our other tyres which my usual place doesn't do.
I would highly recommend using this company and we will definitely be booking them again next time our tyres need changing which is sadly a regular occurrence because the roads are so awful where we live.
